entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
